content.text:
# King Nandhivarman College of Arts and Science

King Nandhivarman College of Arts and Science, is a general degree college located in Thellar, Thiruvannamalai district, Tamil Nadu. It was established in the year 1994. The college is affiliated with Thiruvalluvar University. This college offers different courses in arts, commerce and science.
Accreditation
The college is  recognized by the University Grants Commission (UGC).
